            <string language="x-mt-es">¿thermostream?</string>

          <description>
            <string language="hu">Hővezetés, hőáramlás, hősugárzás</string>
            <string language="en">thermal phenomena</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hővezetés,  hősugárzás,  hőáramlás,  </string>
            <string language="en"> heat insulation, radiation of heat, flow of heat</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Phänomene</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomènes thermiques</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômenos térmicos</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeisolierung, Strahlung der Hitze, Fluß der Hitze</string>

écoulement de la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>

calor</string>

          <keyword>

calor</string>
